swp_compiler_ss13.javabite.backend

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.javabite.backend.Instruction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JumpInstruction

    public class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object

    Instruction

    This class represents a bytecode instruction, with its opcode and arguments.

    Since:
    23.04.2013
    Author:
    eike
